type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Can Have Effect

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/can_have_effect).

Checks whether the entity isn't immune to the specified status effect.

Type ID: `apugli:can_have_effect`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:can_have_effect",
    "effect": "minecraft:wither",
    "inverted": true
}
```
This example checks if the entity is immune to the wither effect.

title: Can Have Effect (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-08-03

Can Have Effect

Entity Condition Type.

Checks whether the entity isn't immune to the specified status effect.

Type ID: apugli:can_have_effect

Fields

Field Type Default Description
effect Identifier ID of the status effect the condition should check.

Example

"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:can_have_effect",
    "effect": "minecraft:wither",
    "inverted": true
}

This example checks if the entity is immune to the wither effect.
